LanguageData.RatkinTunnel_Guerrilla.label: tunnel invasion
LanguageData.RatkinTunnel_Guerrilla.letterText: Several seismic tremors were detected.\n\nA specialized guerrilla Ratkin unit will soon tunnel up from the ground. Take the necessary steps to prepare for the invasion.
LanguageData.RatkinTunnel_Thief.label: Ratkin tunnel
LanguageData.RatkinTunnel_Thief.letterText: A small Ratkin tunnel has been found.\n\nTry to stop the Ratkin thief from leaving with any items.
LanguageData.RatkinFollowUpTroops.label: follow-up unit
LanguageData.RatkinFollowUpTroops.letterText: After the last raid, a follow-up unit was sent as reinforcement. An EMP explosion can be heard outside.\n\nPrepare defenses against the enemy reinforcements.
